game.name: Rail Defence: Eldritch Siege
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Command battle trains in Rail Defence: Eldritch Siege! Face the Eldritch God's trials, fend off waves of minions, and build unbreakable rail defenses. Strategize, upgrade, and fight to protect humanity’s last hope against the cosmic horrors!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Command battle trains in Rail Defence: Eldritch Siege! Face the Eldritch God's trials, fend off waves of minions, and build unbreakable rail defenses. Strategize, upgrade, and fight to protect humanity’s last hope against the cosmic horrors!
